FuncDef: The display drop-event flow-cache command displays information about the packet loss visualization flow table. The display drop-event flow-cache command displays information about the packet loss visualization flow table.
CLIs: display drop-event flow-cache [ ipv4 | ipv6 | vxlan | ethernet ] slot <slot-id>
display drop-event flow-cache [ ipv4 | ipv6 | vxlan ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies Ethernet packets.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
-

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
